rule: Questions must be clear and open ended
explanation: Try to avoid questions that can be answered with a simple yes or no. Instead, ask questions that encourage discussion

rule: Reviews must be as specific as possible
explanation: The purpose of reviews is to give prospective interns as much information as possible on whether a job is the right fit for them or not. You are encouraged to add information about the pros and cons of your internship, why you liked it, how it was beneficial for someone with your background and career goals, etc. Whether you disliked or liked an internship, be ellaborate and explain why.

rule: Keep the overall theme of your posts serious.
explanation: While posts and comments can be lighthearted, pranks and satire is not allowed.
We are all here to learn and help each other out. Be patient if someone doesn't reply right away.
Make sure you read the entire post before asking a question in case it has already been answered.
